resources.string: Hello, my name is Amni Saizan, and I teach programming. \n\nMy mission is to help my students reach their goal of becoming a great programmer. I have experience in Moile App Development Android, Python, Java and Shell. I am also founder of Beauty by Ameni Sparkles. Build Apps with Amni Saizan, where students have soft and technical skills. Showing students on how to make amazing application and software. My goal is to make you a great developer, no matteryour experience. I enjoy spending time with my growing family, baking cakes and cookies, selling Mary Kay products. I look forward to helping you become the best developer you can be. Thank you so much for being here. It means the world to me!
